# metabase_user (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "metabase_user" "user" {
  email = "john.doe@example.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `email` (String) User email address

### Read-Only

- `first_name` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `last_name` (String)
- `user_id` (Number)
